name: Get To Work
description:
Best Abstract Game - SD Game Jam 2016 (Theme: GroupThink)

Get to Work. Where is work? What is work?

Explore shifting goals that respond to how you choose to act — or not act — upon your environment.

It's even better with a bunch of friends in the room with you.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Hold shift to sprint
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to interact
  • Esc to exit

v1.1 w/ post-jam fixes

This game was made in ~48 hours, including post-jam fixes.
